nodes.name: JoinUsingSQL
nodes.description: This node creates a new DataFrame by performing Inner Join or Left Outer Join or Right Outer Join or Full Outer Join

fields.name: tempTable1
fields.title: Temp Table1
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: tempTable2
fields.title: Temp Table2
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value: select a.c1, a.c2, b.c3, b.c4 from fire_temp_table1 a  JOIN fire_temp_table2 b ON(a.c1=b.c1 and a.c3=b.c3)
fields.title: SQL

fields.name: columns
fields.title: SQL Output Column Names separated by space
fields.description: New Output Columns of the SQL

fields.name: columnTypes
fields.title: SQL Output Column Types separated by space
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

nodes.name: JoinUsingSQL
nodes.description: This node creates a new DataFrame by performing Inner Join or Left Outer Join or Right Outer Join or Full Outer Join

fields.name: tempTable1
fields.title: Temp Table1
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: tempTable2
fields.title: Temp Table2
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value: select a.c1, a.c2, b.c3, b.c4 from fire_temp_table1 a FULL OUTER JOIN fire_temp_table2 b ON(a.c3=b.c3 and a.c4=b.c4)
fields.title: SQL
